div.head: 大小腸秘
div.div: large and small intestine are blocked

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: large and small intestine are blocked

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with da xiao bian mi 大小便秘 , stools and urine are blocked. ZLBC wei ling xian 威靈仙 quotes CYLHSF : 大小腸秘，服此立通 , “When large and small intestine are blocked , to ingest this [medication] will immediately make them passable”.
